document.bingtitle: The Quick 10: 10 Nuggets About McDonald’s - Mental Floss
document.webtitle: The Quick 10: 10 Nuggets About McDonalds - Mental Floss
document.description: Taco Bell is by far the best fast food restaurant. ... place my order with at least one of the condiments ... Of all the strange proclivities to pick up when ...
document.body:
SUBSCRIBE > GIFT SUBSCRIPTIONS > DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS > subscriber services > The Quick 10: 10 Nuggets About McDonald’s by Stacy Conradt - May 7, 2009 - 3:19 PM
It was 69 years ago this month that a couple of brothers in San Bernardino, California, decided to set up a quick-service restaurant selling barbeque to travelers. Thanks to them, we’re clogging our arteries with the Big Mac and Filet-O-Fish today, so let’s pay homage to the great Mickey D’s with a bit of trivia about the company and their goods.
